author: mallabs
title: Custodian Layer for Cardano
description: DeFi on Cardano does not work well with custodian banks used by institutional investors. This blocks access to these deep pools of liquidity
solution: Research permission and KYC layer for Cardano wallets, especially light wallets, to establish custodian and permissioned layer.
experience: Traditional finance veterans, quants, experienced Haskell developers.
